root: ^I'm leaving this town soon. Did I tell you?
^Yes. I'm going back to Cloud Town, where I'm from.
^But you've been here for ages... since I was a little kid.
^Haha. Well, it's about time that I visted my family.
^If you happen to stop by Cloud Town, pay me a visit!

^Cloud Town is a beautiful place,
snow glittering across the sky.
